EmailTemplate.name: 2019.12.19 - FedGov - Jabra - FR.FedGov Email - Jabra - FR
EmailTemplate.subject: Attention! Nous vendons les micros-casques Jabra.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultez l'offre en ligne <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Micros-casques Jabra pour une qualité sonore supérieure <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/FR/search/pages/browse/Jabra-Engage-65-75-Wireless-Headsets/_/N-eos?cmp=EBFGJABRA19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> E60PD-190SFB/001/PD L'offre prend fin le 30 sept. 2020 Magasiner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/FR/search/pages/browse/Jabra-Engage-65-75-Wireless-Headsets/_/N-eos?cmp=EBFGJABRA19FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Service à la clientèle <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Modalites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Confidentialite <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov]]>
Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-511-4534
